   22: -module(lasp_SUITE).
   23: -author("Christopher Meiklejohn <christopher.meiklejohn@gmail.com>").
   24: 
   25: %% common_test callbacks
   26: -export([%% suite/0,
   27:          init_per_suite/1,
   28:          end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          all/0]).
   32: 
   33: %% tests
   34: -compile([export_all]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   38: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   39: 
   40: %% ===================================================================
   41: %% common_test callbacks
   42: %% ===================================================================
   43: 
   44: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   45:     %% Start Lasp on the runner and enable instrumentation.
   46:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   47: 
   48:     _Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     %% Stop Lasp on the runner.
   52:     lasp_support:stop_runner(),
   53: 
   54:     _Config.
   55: 
   56: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   57:     ct:pal("Beginning case: ~p", [Case]),
   58: 
   59:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   60:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   61:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   62:     lasp_support:start_runner(),
   63: 
   64:     Nodes = lasp_support:start_nodes(Case, Config),
   65:     [{nodes, Nodes}|Config].
   66: 
   67: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   68:     ct:pal("Case finished: ~p", [Case]),
   69: 
   70:     lasp_support:stop_nodes(Case, Config),
   71: 
   72:     %% Runner must start and stop in between test runs as well, to
   73:     %% ensure that we clear the membership list (otherwise, we could
   74:     %% delete the data on disk, but this is cleaner.)
   75:     lasp_support:stop_runner().
   76: 
   77: all() ->
   78:     [
   79:      contracted_latency_test,
   80:      uncontracted_latency_test,
   81:      latency_with_reads_test,
   82:      sql_parser_test,
   83:      sql_combined_view_test,
   84:      sql_simple_contracted_latency_test,
   85:      sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test,
   86:      sql_join_contracted_latency_test,
   87:      sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test,
   88:      stream_test,
   89:      query_test,
   90: 	 transaction_test,
   91:      ivar_test,
   92:      orset_test,
   93:      awset_ps_test,
   94:      dynamic_ivar_test,
   95:      monotonic_read_test,
   96:      map_test,
   97:      filter_test,
   98:      union_test,
   99:      product_test,
  100:      intersection_test,
  101:      membership_test,
  102:      enforce_once_test
  103:     ].
  104: 
  105: -include("lasp.hrl").
  106: 
  107: %% ===================================================================
  108: %% tests
  109: %% ===================================================================
  110: 
  111: -define(AWSET_PS, awset_ps).
  112: -define(COUNTER, pncounter).
  113: -define(LATENCY_ITERATIONS, 2200).
  114: -define(TRIM, {trim, 100, 100}).
  115: 
  116: -define(ID, <<"myidentifier">>).
  117: 
  118: contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  119:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  120:         true ->
  121:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  122:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  123: 
  124:         _ -> ok
  125:     end.
  126: 
  127: uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  128:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  129:         true ->
  130:             Res = latency_test_case(5, no_contraction, no_read, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  131:             write_csv(path_contraction, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  132: 
  133:         _ -> ok
  134:     end.
  135: 
  136: latency_with_reads_test(_Config) ->
  137:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  138:         true ->
  139:             Res = latency_test_case(5, contraction, random_reads, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS),
  140:             write_csv(path_contraction, contraction_with_reads, Res, ?TRIM);
  141: 
  142:         _ -> ok
  143:     end.
  144: 
  145: sql_parser_test(_Config) ->
  146:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(users, [
  147:         [{name, "Foo"}, {age, 22}],
  148:         [{name, "Bar"}, {age, 9}],
  149:         [{name, "Baz"}, {age, 20}]
  150:     ]),
  151: 
  152:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Bar", 9], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(users, [name, age])),
  153: 
  154:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age = 22 or age < 10"),
  155: 
  156:     %% Stabilize
  157:     timer:sleep(100),
  158: 
  159:     ?assertMatch([["Bar"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [name])),
  160: 
  161:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age <= 22 and age => 10"),
  162: 
  163:     %% Stabilize
  164:     timer:sleep(100),
  165: 
  166:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"], ["Foo"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [name])),
  167: 
  168:     {ok, Id3} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  169: 
  170:     %% Stabilize
  171:     timer:sleep(100),
  172: 
  173:     ?assertMatch([["Baz"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id3, [name])),
  174: 
  175:     {ok, Id4} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where age < 22 and age > 19"),
  176: 
  177:     %% Stabilize
  178:     timer:sleep(100),
  179: 
  180:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id4, [name, age])),
  181: 
  182:     {ok, Id5} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select name, age from users where name = 'Foo' or name = 'Baz'"),
  183: 
  184:     %% Stabilize
  185:     timer:sleep(100),
  186: 
  187:     ?assertMatch([["Baz", 20], ["Foo", 22]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id5, [name, age])),
  188: 
  189:     ok.
  190: 
  191: sql_combined_view_test(_Config) ->
  192:     ok = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_table_with_values(classics, [
  193:         [{title, "Breathless"}, {year, 1960}, {rating, 80}],
  194:         [{title, "A Woman Is a Woman"}, {year, 1961}, {rating, 76}],
  195:         [{title, "Masculin Feminin"}, {year, 1966}, {rating, 77}],
  196:         [{title, "La Chinoise"}, {year, 1967}, {rating, 73}]
  197:     ]),
  198: 
  199:     {OutputId, Type}=Output = lasp_sql_materialized_view:generate_identifier(filtered),
  200:     %% have to declare the value explicitly, otherwise query will fail on write
  201:     lasp:declare(OutputId, Type),
  202:     {ok, Id1} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Output,
  203:                                                   "select title, rating from classics where year => 1960 and year <= 1965"),
  204: 
  205:     %% Stabilize
  206:     timer:sleep(100),
  207: 
  208:     ?assertMatch([["A Woman Is a Woman"], ["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id1, [title])),
  209: 
  210:     {ok, Id2} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select title from filtered where rating => 80"),
  211: 
  212:     %% Stabilize
  213:     timer:sleep(100),
  214: 
  215:     ?assertMatch([["Breathless"]], lasp_sql_materialized_view:get_value(Id2, [title])),
  216: 
  217:     ok.
  218: 
  219: latency_test_case(NVertices, Optimization, RandomReadsConfig, Iterations) ->
  220:     Ids = generate_path(NVertices, ?COUNTER),
  221:     case Optimization of
  222:         no_contraction ->
  223:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  224:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  225:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  226:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  227:         _ ->
  228:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  229:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  230:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  231:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  232:     end,
  233:     First = lists:nth(1, Ids),
  234:     Intermediate = case RandomReadsConfig of
  235:         random_reads ->
  236:             lists:sublist(Ids, 2, length(Ids) - 2);
  237:         _ -> []
  238:     end,
  239:     Last = lists:last(Ids),
  240:     latency_run_case(Iterations, [], RandomReadsConfig,
  241:                      First, Intermediate, Last, increment, undefined).
  242: 
  243: latency_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  244: latency_run_case(Iterations, Acc, RandomReadsConfig,
  245:                  From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, Threshold0) ->
  246: 
  247:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  248:     MutateAndRead = fun(Src, Dst, Mutation, Thr) ->
  249:         lasp:update(Src, Mutation, a),
  250:         lasp:read(Dst, Thr)
  251:     end,
  252:     case RandomReadsConfig of
  253:         no_read -> ok;
  254:         random_reads ->
  255:             %% Read from a random intermediate vertex every 10 iterations
  256:             case (Iterations rem 10) =:= 0 of
  257:                 true ->
  258:                     RPos = lasp_support:puniform(length(Intermediate)),
  259:                     RandomChoice = lists:nth(RPos, Intermediate),
  260:                     lasp:read(RandomChoice, undefined);
  261:                 _ -> ok
  262:             end
  263:     end,
  264:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Mutator, Threshold]),
  265: 
  266:     latency_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], RandomReadsConfig,
  267:                      From, Intermediate, To, Mutator, NewThreshold).
  268: 
  269: 
  270: sql_simple_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  271:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  272:         true ->
  273:             %% Topology.
  274:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  275:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  276:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  277: 
  278:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  279:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  280: 
  281:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  282:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  283: 
  284:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  285: 
  286:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  287:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  288: 
  289:         _ -> ok
  290:     end.
  291: 
  292: sql_simple_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  293:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  294:         true ->
  295:             %% Topology.
  296:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  297:             Middle = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(middle),
  298:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  299: 
  300:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Middle,
  301:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0"),
  302: 
  303:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  304:                                                         "select b, c from middle where b = 'foo'"),
  305: 
  306:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  307: 
  308:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  309:             write_csv(sql_simple_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  310: 
  311:         _ -> ok
  312:     end.
  313: 
  314: sql_join_contracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  315:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  316:         true ->
  317:             %% Topology.
  318:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  319:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  320:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  321:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  322: 
  323:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  324: 
  325:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  326:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  327: 
  328:         _ -> ok
  329:     end.
  330: 
  331: sql_join_uncontracted_latency_test(_Config) ->
  332:     case lasp_config:get(dag_enabled, true) of
  333:         true ->
  334:             %% Topology.
  335:             Initial = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(initial),
  336:             Final = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create_empty_table(final),
  337:             {ok, _} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create(Final,
  338:                                                         "select a, b, c from initial where a > 0 and b = 'foo'"),
  339: 
  340:             {ok, ResultTable} = lasp_sql_materialized_view:create("select c from final where c < 20"),
  341: 
  342:             Res = sql_latency_test_case(no_contraction, ?LATENCY_ITERATIONS, Initial, ResultTable, [{a, 1}, {b, "foo"}, {c, 0}]),
  343:             write_csv(sql_join_queries, no_contraction, Res, ?TRIM);
  344: 
  345:         _ -> ok
  346:     end.
  347: 
  348: generate_path(N, Type) ->
  349:     [_|Tail]=Ids = lists:map(fun(_) ->
  350:         {ok, {Id, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(Type),
  351:         Id
  352:     end, lists:seq(1, N)),
  353:     zipwith(fun(L, R) ->
  354:         lasp:bind_to(R, L)
  355:     end, Ids, Tail),
  356:     Ids.
  357: 
  358: zipwith(Fn, [X | Xs], [Y | Ys]) ->
  359:     [Fn(X, Y) | zipwith(Fn, Xs, Ys)];
  360: 
  361: zipwith(Fn, _, _) when is_function(Fn, 2) -> [].
  362: 
  363: sql_latency_test_case(Optimization, Iterations, From, To, Mutation) ->
  364:     case Optimization of
  365:         no_contraction ->
  366:             %% Disable automatic contraction
  367:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, false),
  368:             %% Force a full cleaving before starting the test
  369:             lasp_dependence_dag:cleave_all();
  370:         contraction ->
  371:             %% Enable automatic contraction
  372:             lasp_config:set(automatic_contraction, true),
  373:             %% Force a contraction before starting the test
  374:             lasp_dependence_dag:contract()
  375:     end,
  376:     sql_run_case(Iterations, [], From, To, Mutation, undefined).
  377: 
  378: sql_run_case(0, Acc, _, _, _, _) -> lists:reverse(Acc);
  379: sql_run_case(Iterations, Acc, From, To, Row, Threshold0) ->
  380:     Threshold = {strict, Threshold0},
  381:     MutateAndRead = fun(F, T, R, Th) ->
  382:         lasp_sql_materialized_view:insert_row(F, R),
  383:         lasp:read(T, Th)
  384:     end,
  385:     {Time, {ok, {_, _, _, NewThreshold}}} = timer:tc(MutateAndRead, [From, To, Row, Threshold]),
  386:     sql_run_case(Iterations - 1, [Time | Acc], From, To, Row, NewThreshold).
  387: 
  388: write_csv(Dir, Option, Cases, Trim) ->
  389:     Path = code:priv_dir(lasp)
  390:            ++ "/evaluation/logs/"
  391:            ++ atom_to_list(Dir) ++ "/"
  392:            ++ atom_to_list(Option) ++ "/"
  393:            ++ integer_to_list(timestamp()) ++ "/",
  394:     ok = filelib:ensure_dir(Path),
  395:     Trimmed = case Trim of
  396:         {trim, Start, End} -> lists:sublist(Cases, Start + 1, (length(Cases) - (Start + End)));
  397:         _ -> Cases
  398:     end,
  399:     lists:foreach(fun(Case) ->
  400:         file:write_file(Path ++ "runner.csv", io_lib:fwrite("~p\n", [Case]), [append])
  401:     end, Trimmed).
  402: 
  403: timestamp() ->
  404:     {Mega, Sec, _Micro} = erlang:timestamp(),
  405:     Mega * 1000000 + Sec.
  406: 
  407: %% @doc Increment counter and test stream behaviour.
  408: stream_test(_Config) ->
  409:     %% Declare a variable.
  410:     {ok, {C1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?COUNTER),
  411: 
  412:     %% Stream results.
  413:     Self = self(),
  414:     Function = fun(V) ->
  415:                        Self ! {ok, V}
  416:                end,
  417:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:stream(C1, Function)),
  418: 
  419:     %% Increment.
  420:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, a)),
  421: 
  422:     %% Wait for message.
  423:     receive
  424:         {ok, 1} ->
  425:             ok
  426:     after
  427:         300 ->
  428:             ct:fail(missing_first_message)
  429:     end,
  430: 
  431:     %% Increment again.
  432:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(C1, increment, b)),
  433: 
  434:     %% Wait for message.
  435:     receive
  436:         {ok, 2} ->
  437:             ok
  438:     after
  439:         300 ->
  440:             ct:fail(missing_second_message)
  441:     end.
  442: 
  443: %% @doc Test query functionality.
  444: query_test(_Config) ->
  445:     %% Declare a variable.
  446:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  447: 
  448:     %% Change it's value.
  449:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, 2}, a)),
  450: 
  451:     %% Threshold read just to create a synchronization point for the
  452:     %% value to change.
  453:     {ok, _} = lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined}),
  454: 
  455:     %% Query it.
  456:     ?assertMatch({ok, 2}, lasp:query(I1)),
  457: 
  458:     ok.
  459: 
  460: 
  461: %% @doc Test transaction functionality.
  462: transaction_test(_Config) ->
  463:     
  464:     %% Create initial set.
  465:     {ok, {SourceId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare({<<"source">>, state_orset}, state_orset),
  466:     %% Apply .transaction
  467:     ?assertMatch(ok,lasp:transaction([{SourceId, {add, 2}},{SourceId, {add, 1}}], self())),
  468:     
  469:      {ok, Result} = lasp:query(SourceId), sets:to_list(Result),
  470:     
  471:      %%% resultat
  472:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([2,1])}, {ok, Result}),
  473: 
  474:     
  475:     
  476: 
  477:     ok.
  478: 
  479: 
  480: %% @doc Single-assignment variable test.
  481: ivar_test(_Config) ->
  482:     %% Single-assignment variables.
  483:     {ok, {I1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  484:     {ok, {I2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  485:     {ok, {I3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(ivar),
  486: 
  487:     V1 = 1,
  488: 
  489:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  490:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I2, I1)),
  491:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(I1, {set, V1}, a)),
  492:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(I3, I1)),
  493: 
  494:     timer:sleep(4000),
  495: 
  496:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  497:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I3, {strict, undefined})),
  498:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I2, {strict, undefined})),
  499:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, {_, V1}}}, lasp:read(I1, {strict, undefined})),
  500: 
  501:     ok.
  502: 
  503: %% @doc Map operation test.
  504: map_test(_Config) ->
  505:     %% Create initial set.
  506:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  507: 
  508:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  509:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  510: 
  511:     %% Create second set.
  512:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  513: 
  514:     %% Apply map.
  515:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:map(S1, fun(X) -> X * 2 end, S2)),
  516: 
  517:     %% Wait.
  518:     timer:sleep(4000),
  519: 
  520:     %% Bind again.
  521:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  522: 
  523:     %% Wait.
  524:     timer:sleep(4000),
  525: 
  526:     %% Read resulting value.
  527:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  528: 
  529:     %% Read resulting value.
  530:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  531: 
  532:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6,8,10,12])},
  533:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  534: 
  535:     ok.
  536: 
  537: %% @doc Filter operation test.
  538: filter_test(_Config) ->
  539:     %% Create initial set.
  540:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  541: 
  542:     %% Add elements to initial set and update.
  543:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  544: 
  545:     %% Create second set.
  546:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  547: 
  548:     %% Apply filter.
  549:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:filter(S1, fun(X) -> X rem 2 == 0 end, S2)),
  550: 
  551:     %% Wait.
  552:     timer:sleep(4000),
  553: 
  554:     %% Bind again.
  555:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [4,5,6]}, a)),
  556: 
  557:     %% Wait.
  558:     timer:sleep(4000),
  559: 
  560:     %% Read resulting value.
  561:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1V4}} = lasp:read(S1, {strict, undefined}),
  562: 
  563:     %% Read resulting value.
  564:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2V1}} = lasp:read(S2, {strict, undefined}),
  565: 
  566:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5,6]), sets:from_list([2,4,6])},
  567:                  {ok, lasp_type:query(?SET, S1V4), lasp_type:query(?SET, S2V1)}),
  568: 
  569:     ok.
  570: 
  571: %% @doc Union operation test.
  572: union_test(_Config) ->
  573:     %% Create initial sets.
  574:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  575:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  576: 
  577:     %% Create output set.
  578:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  579: 
  580:     %% Populate initial sets.
  581:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  582:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,c]}, a)),
  583: 
  584:     %% Apply union.
  585:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:union(S1, S2, S3)),
  586: 
  587:     %% Sleep.
  588:     timer:sleep(400),
  589: 
  590:     %% Read union.
  591:     {ok, {_, _, _, Union0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  592: 
  593:     %% Read union value.
  594:     Union = lasp_type:query(?SET, Union0),
  595: 
  596:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([1,2,3,a,b,c])}, {ok, Union}),
  597: 
  598:     ok.
  599: 
  600: %% @doc Intersection test.
  601: intersection_test(_Config) ->
  602:     %% Create initial sets.
  603:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  604:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  605: 
  606:     %% Create output set.
  607:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  608: 
  609:     %% Populate initial sets.
  610:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  611:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  612: 
  613:     %% Apply intersection.
  614:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:intersection(S1, S2, S3)),
  615: 
  616:     %% Sleep.
  617:     timer:sleep(400),
  618: 
  619:     %% Read intersection.
  620:     {ok, {_, _, _, Intersection0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  621: 
  622:     %% Read intersection value.
  623:     Intersection = lasp_type:query(?SET, Intersection0),
  624: 
  625:     ?assertEqual({ok, sets:from_list([3])}, {ok, Intersection}),
  626: 
  627:     ok.
  628: 
  629: %% @doc Cartesian product test.
  630: product_test(_Config) ->
  631:     %% Create initial sets.
  632:     {ok, {S1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  633:     {ok, {S2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  634: 
  635:     %% Create output set.
  636:     {ok, {S3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  637: 
  638:     %% Populate initial sets.
  639:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S1, {add_all, [1,2,3]}, a)),
  640:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(S2, {add_all, [a,b,3]}, a)),
  641: 
  642:     %% Apply product.
  643:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:product(S1, S2, S3)),
  644: 
  645:     %% Sleep.
  646:     timer:sleep(400),
  647: 
  648:     %% Read product.
  649:     {ok, {_, _, _, Product0}} = lasp:read(S3, undefined),
  650: 
  651:     %% Read product value.
  652:     Product = lasp_type:query(?SET, Product0),
  653: 
  654:     ?assertEqual({ok,sets:from_list([{1,3},{1,a},{1,b},{2,3},{2,a},{2,b},{3,3},{3,a},{3,b}])}, {ok, Product}),
  655: 
  656:     ok.
  657: 
  658: %% @doc Monotonic read.
  659: monotonic_read_test(_Config) ->
  660:     %% Create new set-based CRDT.
  661:     {ok, {SetId, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  662: 
  663:     %% Determine my pid.
  664:     Me = self(),
  665: 
  666:     %% Perform 4 binds, each an inflation.
  667:     ?assertMatch({ok, _},
  668:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [1]}, actor)),
  669: 
  670:     {ok, {_, _, _, V0}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [2]}, actor),
  671: 
  672:     ?assertMatch({ok, {_, _, _, _}},
  673:                  lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [3]}, actor)),
  674: 
  675:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is strict inflation of
  676:     %% V0.
  677:     I1 = first_read,
  678:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I1, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V0})} end),
  679: 
  680:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3].
  681:     Set1 = receive
  682:         {I1, {ok, {_, _, _, X}}} ->
  683:             lasp_type:query(?SET, X)
  684:     end,
  685: 
  686:     %% Perform more inflations.
  687:     {ok, {_, _, _, V1}} = lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [4]}, actor),
  688: 
  689:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:update(SetId, {add_all, [5]}, actor)),
  690: 
  691:     %% Spawn fun which should block until lattice is a strict inflation
  692:     %% of V1.
  693:     I2 = second_read,
  694:     spawn(fun() -> Me ! {I2, lasp:read(SetId, {strict, V1})} end),
  695: 
  696:     %% Ensure we receive [1, 2, 3, 4].
  697:     Set2 = receive
  698:         {I2, {ok, {_, _, _, Y}}} ->
  699:             lasp_type:query(?SET, Y)
  700:     end,
  701: 
  702:     ?assertEqual({sets:from_list([1,2,3]), sets:from_list([1,2,3,4,5])},
  703:                  {Set1, Set2}),
  704: 
  705:     ok.
  706: 
  707: %% @doc Dynamic variable test.
  708: dynamic_ivar_test(Config) ->
  709:     [Node1, Node2 | _Nodes] = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  710: 
  711:     %% Setup a dynamic variable.
  712:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  713:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  714: 
  715:     %% Now, the following action should be idempotent.
  716:     {ok, {Id, _, _, Value}} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, declare_dynamic,
  717:                                        [?ID, ivar]),
  718: 
  719:     %% Bind node 1's name to the value on node 1: this should not
  720:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  721:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node1}}},
  722:                  rpc:call(Node1, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node1}])),
  723: 
  724:     %% Bind node 2's name to the value on node 2: this should not
  725:     %% trigger a broadcast message because the variable is dynamic.
  726:     ?assertMatch({ok, {Id, _, _, {_, Node2}}},
  727:                  rpc:call(Node2, lasp, bind, [{?ID, ivar}, {state_ivar, Node2}])),
  728: 
  729:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  730:     {ok, Node1} = rpc:call(Node1, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  731: 
  732:     %% Verify variable has the correct value.
  733:     {ok, Node2} = rpc:call(Node2, lasp, query, [{?ID, ivar}]),
  734: 
  735:     ok.
  736: 
  737: %% @doc Test of the orset.
  738: orset_test(_Config) ->
  739:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  740:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  741:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  742: 
  743:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  744:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  745:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  746:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  747: 
  748:     timer:sleep(4000),
  749: 
  750:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  751:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  752:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  753:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  754: 
  755:     Self = self(),
  756: 
  757:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  758:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  759:                   Self ! threshold_met
  760:                end),
  761: 
  762:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  763: 
  764:     timer:sleep(4000),
  765: 
  766:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  767:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  768:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L3)),
  769:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  770:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L2)),
  771:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  772:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?SET, S2, S2L1)),
  773: 
  774:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  775:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  776: 
  777:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  778:     receive
  779:         threshold_met ->
  780:             ok
  781:     end,
  782: 
  783:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  784:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?SET),
  785: 
  786:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  787:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  788:                 Self ! read_any
  789:         end),
  790: 
  791:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  792: 
  793:     receive
  794:         read_any ->
  795:             ok
  796:     end,
  797: 
  798:     ok.
  799: 
  800: %% @doc Enforce once test.
  801: enforce_once_test(Config) ->
  802:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  803:     lager:info("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  804: 
  805:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  806:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  807:     Node = hd(lists:usort(Nodes)),
  808: 
  809:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  810:     timer:sleep(10000),
  811: 
  812:     %% Declare the object first: if not, invariant can't be registered.
  813:     Id = {<<"object">>, ?COUNTER_TYPE},
  814:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, declare, [Id, ?COUNTER_TYPE]),
  815: 
  816:     %% Define an enforce-once invariant.
  817:     Self = self(),
  818:     Threshold = {value, 1},
  819: 
  820:     EnforceFun = fun(X) ->
  821:                          lager:info("Enforce function fired with: ~p", [X]),
  822:                          Self ! {ok, Threshold}
  823:                  end,
  824: 
  825:     lager:info("Adding invariant on node: ~p!", [Node]),
  826: 
  827:     case rpc:call(Node, lasp, enforce_once, [Id, Threshold, EnforceFun]) of
  828:         ok ->
  829:             lager:info("Invariant configured!");
  830:         Error ->
  831:             lager:info("Invariant can't be configured: ~p", [Error]),
  832:             ct:fail(failed)
  833:     end,
  834: 
  835:     %% Increment counter twice to get trigger to fire.
  836:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  837:     {ok, _} = rpc:call(Node, lasp, update, [Id, increment, self()]),
  838: 
  839:     lager:info("Waiting for response..."),
  840:     receive
  841:         {ok, Threshold} ->
  842:             ok
  843:     after
  844:         10000 ->
  845:             lager:info("Did not receive response!"),
  846:             ct:fail(failed)
  847:     end,
  848: 
  849:     lager:info("Finished enforce_once test."),
  850: 
  851:     ok.
  852: 
  853: %% @doc Membership test.
  854: membership_test(Config) ->
  855:     Manager = lasp_peer_service:manager(),
  856:     ct:pal("Manager: ~p", [Manager]),
  857: 
  858:     Nodes = proplists:get_value(nodes, Config),
  859:     lager:info("Nodes: ~p", [Nodes]),
  860:     Sorted = lists:usort(Nodes),
  861: 
  862:     lager:info("Waiting for cluster to stabilize."),
  863:     timer:sleep(10000),
  864: 
  865:     case Manager of
  866:         partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager ->
  867:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  868:                                 {ok, Active} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, active, []),
  869:                                 {ok, Passive} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, passive, []),
  870: 
  871:                                 case lists:usort([Name || {Name, _, _} <- sets:to_list(Active)]) of
  872:                                     Sorted ->
  873:                                         ok;
  874:                                     WrongActive ->
  875:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in active view on node ~p: ~p should be ~p!",
  876:                                                 [Node, WrongActive, Sorted])
  877:                                 end,
  878: 
  879:                                 case sets:to_list(Passive) of
  880:                                     [] ->
  881:                                         ok;
  882:                                     WrongPassive ->
  883:                                         ct:fail("Incorrect nodes in passive view: ~p!",
  884:                                                 [WrongPassive])
  885:                                 end
  886:                           end, Nodes);
  887:         partisan_default_peer_service_manager ->
  888:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  889:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
  890:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
  891:                           end, Nodes);
  892:         partisan_client_server_peer_service_manager ->
  893:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  894:                                 {ok, Members} = rpc:call(Node, Manager, members, []),
  895:                                 lists:usort(Members) =:= lists:usort(Nodes)
  896:                           end, Nodes)
  897:     end,
  898: 
  899:     ok.
  900: 
  901: %% @doc Test of the add-wins set.
  902: awset_ps_test(_Config) ->
  903:     {ok, {L1, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  904:     {ok, {L2, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  905:     {ok, {L3, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  906: 
  907:     %% Attempt pre, and post- dataflow variable bind operations.
  908:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L2, L1)),
  909:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2}} = lasp:update(L1, {add, 1}, a),
  910:     ?assertMatch(ok, lasp:bind_to(L3, L1)),
  911: 
  912:     timer:sleep(4000),
  913: 
  914:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  915:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  916:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  917:     {ok, {_, _, _, S1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  918: 
  919:     Self = self(),
  920: 
  921:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  922:                   {ok, _} = lasp:wait_needed(L1, {strict, S1}),
  923:                   Self ! threshold_met
  924:                end),
  925: 
  926:     ?assertMatch({ok, _}, lasp:bind(L1, S2)),
  927: 
  928:     timer:sleep(4000),
  929: 
  930:     %% Verify the same value is contained by all.
  931:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L3}} = lasp:read(L3, {strict, undefined}),
  932:     ?assertEqual(S2L3, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L3)),
  933:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L2}} = lasp:read(L2, {strict, undefined}),
  934:     ?assertEqual(S2L2, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L2)),
  935:     {ok, {_, _, _, S2L1}} = lasp:read(L1, {strict, undefined}),
  936:     ?assertEqual(S2L1, lasp_type:merge(?AWSET_PS, S2, S2L1)),
  937: 
  938:     %% Read at the S2 threshold level.
  939:     {ok, {_, _, _, _}} = lasp:read(L1, S2),
  940: 
  941:     %% Wait for wait_needed to unblock.
  942:     receive
  943:         threshold_met ->
  944:             ok
  945:     end,
  946: 
  947:     {ok, {L5, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  948:     {ok, {L6, _, _, _}} = lasp:declare(?AWSET_PS),
  949: 
  950:     spawn_link(fun() ->
  951:                 {ok, _} = lasp:read_any([{L5, {strict, undefined}}, {L6, {strict, undefined}}]),
  952:                 Self ! read_any
  953:         end),
  954: 
  955:     {ok, _} = lasp:update(L5, {add, 1}, a),
  956: 
  957:     receive
  958:         read_any ->
  959:             ok
  960:     end.
